name: tm07
effect: Teaches Hail to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Hail to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Zap Cannon Gen I: Horn Drill)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
